newsitem.title: KUWAIT: Kuwait stock index soars to new record.
newsitem.headline: Kuwait stock index soars to new record.

text.p: Kuwait's share index set new highs this week, breaking through the 2,100 points marker and closing at 2,144.7 on Tuesday.
The index has been gaining on the back of strong year-end results by listed companies which are still being issued, traders say. It rose by 12.6 percent so far this year.
The index, which crossed the 2,000 point mark on January 27, gained a total of almost 60 points in the last two days.
The post 1991 Gulf War index, launched on November 25, 1995 at 1,380.6 points, rose almost 40 percent in 1996.
Securities House was among listed concerns which made the large gains so far this year, closing at 710 fils ($2.34) on Tuesday compared to 400 fils at the start of 1997.
There are 1,000 fils to the dinar.

Other gainers during the same period included Kuwait Investment Company closing at 355 fils from 265, al- Ahlia Investment Co shares up 220 fils to 580 and National Cleaning closed on Tuesday at 1.12 dinars from 730 fils at the start of the year.
Trading value during Tuesday's 2-1/2-hour session amounted to 63.2 million dinars.
